content.question: Suppose the for loop initialization int j = 0 in line 4 of the method is replaced with int j = 1. Which of the following best explains the effect of this change?

choices.label: It will have no effect on the behavior of the method.
It will cause the method to return a different result when key is not in words.
It will cause the method to return a different result when key is found only at the first index in words.
It will cause the method to return a different result when key is found only at the last index in the list.

content.answer: It will cause the method to return a different result when key is found only at the first index in words.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
